original: intros. inversion 1. split. - inversion H0; inversion H2; subst. assert (Hx : pi = i) by (eapply subcode_cons_inv; eauto). rewrite Hx. auto. - inversion H0; inversion H2; subst. assert (Hx : pi = i) by (eapply subcode_cons_inv; eauto). assert (Hw : p = 1 + i) by eauto 8 using in_mma_sss_dec_0. subst. rewrite Hx, Hw; simpl. rewrite vec_plus_cons, Vector_spec_append_splitat_vector_cons. f_equal. apply Vec_spec_eq_sum. assert(Heq : Sum_of_vector (Vector.nth v x) = 0) by eauto using vec_one_spec_eq.
